mil3.2.7:1.3: “Alaṁ, mahārāja, kiṁ te tena pucchitena, nanu mayā paṭikacceva akkhātaṁ ‘sace, mahārāja, saupādāno bhavissāmi, paṭisandahissāmi, sace anupādāno bhavissāmi, na paṭisandahissāmī’”ti.
mil3.2.7:2.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso rañño adhikāraṁ kareyya.
mil3.2.7:2.3: Rājā tuṭṭho adhikāraṁ dadeyya, so tena adhikārena pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricareyya, so ce janassa āroceyya ‘na me rājā kiñci paṭikarotī’ti.
mil3.2.7:2.4: Kiṁ nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso yuttakārī bhaveyyā”ti?
mil3.2.7:2.6: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kiṁ te tena pucchitena, nanu mayā paṭikacceva akkhātaṁ ‘sace saupādāno bhavissāmi, paṭisandahissāmi, sace anupādāno bhavissāmi, na paṭisandahissāmī’”ti.
